structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
URBAN SERVICES DISTRICTS -- AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Board of directors -- Appointment -- Term of office -- Vacancies -- Quorum -- Removal of board members.

text.section: Each board member shall reside within the district and within the county or city of which he was appointed to represent.

The board of directors shall be appointed within thirty (30) days after the establishment of the district. Directors shall be appointed for terms of two (2) years each, except that initially the appointing authority shall appoint a minority of the board members for one (1) year terms. Subsequent terms shall all be for two (2) years. Any vacancies shall be filled by the appointing authority for the unexpired term.
A majority of the membership of the board shall constitute a quorum.
A member of the board of directors may be removed from office as provided by KRS 65.007.
